name: contextengine
description: Durable memory and enforcement for AI coding agents. Monitors uncommitted changes, enforces session protocol, reminds agents to commit and save context — so your AI sessions end clean, not chaotic.

chatParticipants.name: contextengine
chatParticipants.description: AI agent compliance — session status, uncommitted changes, enforcement reminders, knowledge search

commands.name: status
commands.description: Show session health: uncommitted changes, session state, enforcement score

commands.name: commit
commands.description: Stage and commit all changes across workspace projects

commands.name: remind
commands.description: Show the full enforcement checklist and what's missing

contextengine.gitCheckInterval.description: How often (in seconds) to check for uncommitted git changes

contextengine.enableNotifications.description: Show notification warnings for uncommitted changes

contextengine.enableStatusBar.description: Show session health in the status bar

contextengine.autoCommitReminder.description: Remind to commit after file saves accumulate without a git commit

contextengine.maxDirtyFilesBeforeWarning.description: Number of uncommitted files before showing a warning
